updates.title: OpenAI Launches Sora: The Video Revolution
updates.description:
OpenAI has officially released Sora to premium users. This model can generate 60-second high-fidelity videos from text.

The AI community is stunned by the realism of the physics and lighting in these generated clips.

Experts suggest this will disrupt the traditional stock footage and advertising industries forever.

Beta testers are currently exploring cinematic storytelling with Sora.

Sora's safety features ensure no harmful content is generated during the initial rollout.

updates.title: Google Gemini 2.0 Pro: Ultimate Performance
updates.description:
Google announces Gemini 2.0 Pro with a massive 2-million token context window.

It can now process hours of video and thousands of code files in one single prompt.

Integration with Google Workspace is now seamless across all mobile devices.

The update includes improved reasoning capabilities for complex coding tasks.

Developers can now access the new API via Vertex AI for enterprise scaling.
